alert.message:
*Description:* 
Bobcat miner CPU core temperature is at an inoperable state

*Resolution:* 
Power off the unit and check that the cooling and heating systems are functioning properly.
alert.name: Temperature alert

alert.message:
*Description:*
Miner height gap is increasing and getting further out of sync.

*Resolution:*
* Verify there are no issues with the blockchain on discord
* Verify if your miner has an update from the vendor discord
* Power off your miner for 2 minutes then power it back on again. Make sure the antenna is secure before power cycling
alert.name: Height Gap alert
